授業目的: To enable students to communicate smoothly in English. Because of corona virus we will have classes online. This will usually be on Zoom but there may be some on-demand classes.
到達目標: To enable students to communicate smoothly in English.
授業方法: This is a practical class. The teacher is there to help and guide but it is only by actively participating that students will benefit and improve. It is therefore a student-entered class.
